channel.title: Pre-Assessment Planning on Hacking the Cloud
channel.description: Recent content in Pre-Assessment Planning on Hacking the Cloud

item.title: Consider Assessment Type
item.description: When performing offensive security operations you have a multitude of options for the type of assessment you’d like to conduct. The following are just a handful. Think of these types of assessments as a spectrum, any combination is perfectly acceptable so long as it is in line with the goals of the organization.
